channel.title: CVE Feed for OPPO -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for OPPO -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-26310|2024-08-02T11:46:23.520Z -- oppo -- oppo%20find%20x3
item.description: There is a command injection problem in the old version of the mobile phone backup app.

item.title: CVE-2023-26309|2024-08-02T11:46:23.927Z -- oppo -- oneplus%20store
item.description: A remote code execution vulnerability in the webview component of OnePlus Store app.

item.title: CVE-2023-26311|2024-08-02T11:46:24.386Z -- oppo -- oppo%20store
item.description: A remote code execution vulnerability in the webview component of OPPO Store app.

item.title: CVE-2024-1608|2024-06-27T18:51:36.363Z -- oppo -- usercenter%20credit%20sdk
item.description: In OPPO Usercenter Credit SDK, there's a possible escalation of privilege due to loose permission check, This could lead to application internal information leak w/o user interaction.

item.description: In OPPO Usercenter Credit SDK, there's a possible escalation of privilege due to loose permission check, This could lead to application internal information leak w/o user interaction.
